    about the studio

    Verdi Studio crafts aesthetically designed websites for creative entreprenuers and small business owners.

    Here at the studio we find that we are always inspired by those stepping outside of the box with their independent businesses. That's why we are passionate about helping you tell your story through your own custom-built site, coded with beautiful designs and thoughtful content.
